title: News24.com | International Covid-19 update | Europe death toll tops 90 000, Nigeria economy to shrink by 3.4%, Japan PM expands state of emergency nationwide
description: With a total of 90 180 deaths out of some 1 047 279 infections, Europe is the hardest-hit continent by the pandemic, which has killed a total of 137 499 worldwide.
content:
